description: This file defines URL patterns for a Django web application's API endpoints, mapping URLs to corresponding view functions related to health checks, conversation management, and note handling.

methods.name: health
methods.description: View function handling health check requests.

methods.name: start_conversation
methods.description: View function to initiate a new conversation.

methods.name: send_message
methods.description: View function to send a message within a conversation.

methods.name: continue_conversation
methods.description: View function to continue an existing conversation.

methods.name: generate_note
methods.description: View function to generate a note based on conversation context.

methods.name: save_note_to_onedrive
methods.description: View function to save a note to OneDrive.

methods.name: conversation_status
methods.description: View function to retrieve the status of a conversation.
